LanguageData.ARA_Base_Technology.label: Basic gene sequence acquisition
LanguageData.ARA_Base_Technology.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. You can unlock the basic technology of the insect swarm and hatch basic auxiliary insects and weapon organs. The blueprints of all technologies of the Arachne insect swarm must be researched using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1WMT.label: Node WMT-1 "Breakthrough"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1WMT.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Empress species and craft species can be evolved to the next stage. All technology blueprints of the Arachne insect group must be researched using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2WMT.label: Node WMT-2 "Breakthrough 2"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2WMT.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Empress species and craft species can be evolved to the next stage. All technology blueprints of the Arachne insect group must be researched using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6VXI.label: Node VXI-6 "Acid Sac"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6VXI.description: Arachne Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Insects with acid sacs are able to spray strong acids to repel enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7VXI.label: Node VXI-7 "External Acid Bag"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7VXI.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. New weapons can be hatched from Arachne cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8VXI.label: Node VXI-8 "Large Acid Gland"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8VXI.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. New weapons can be hatched from Arachne cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9VXI.label: Node VXI-9 "Acid Rain"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9VXI.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. New weapons can be hatched from Arachne cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_10VXI.label: Node VXI-10 "Small Disaster"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_10VXI.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. New weapons can be hatched from Arachne cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_11VXI.label: Node VXI-11 "Disaster"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_11VXI.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the Hive Antenna is the fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. You will now be able to build a Disaster Acid Cannon organization, a powerful defensive structure that can not only repel hordes of enemies, but also launch attacks across the map.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1THD.label: Node THD-1 "Psychic Lightning"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1THD.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the Hive Antenna is the basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. You will be able to hatch new psychic lightning-based weapons from Arachne cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2HAG.label: Node HAG-2 "Hatchling Pond"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2HAG.description: Arachnidae - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups, and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. The Arachnidae will be able to construct a series of incubation pond-related structures to hatch new insect groups.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1KYC.label: Node KYC-1 "Warrior Bug"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1KYC.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Empress species can hatch new insect tribes - warrior species. All technology blueprints of the Arachne insect group must be researched using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4KYC.label: Node KYC-4 "Protozoa"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4KYC.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. \ nThe Empress species can hatch a new Insect race - a Protozoan species. It is a special insect that parasitizes and controls other races. The blueprints for all technologies of the Arachne insect group must be researched using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2KYC.label: Node KYC-2 "Flight Wing Membrane"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2KYC.description: Arachne insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. A new empress species Insects - Can hatch aerial species. An agile and deadly elite insect race with the ability to crisscross the battlefield in flight. The blueprints for all of the Arachne Insects' technologies must be completed using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5KYC.label: Node KYC-5 "Giant Armor"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5KYC.description: Arachne Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The Empress species is a new insect group— —You can hatch the Stray Mist species, which are large insects with thick shells that support mass attacks using smoke screens, fire retardants, and insect swarm reinforcement information elements. The blueprints for all Arachne insect swarm technologies must be researched using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6KYC.label: Node KYC-6 "Spiritual Brain"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6KYC.description: Arachne insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. A new empress species Namushi tribe - Can hatch Origen species. They have long lifespans and strong mental abilities, and can also support the insect group's research and perform powerful magic. The blueprints for all techniques of the Arachne insect group must be researched using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7KYC.label: Node KYC-7 "Guardian"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7KYC.description: Arachne Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups, and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. The Empress species is a new insect group - a forbidden species It has a longer lifespan than other insect tribes, has excellent long-range combat and social skills, and can also lead the insect swarm as a commander. The blueprints for all technologies of the Arachne insect group must be researched using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6MEN.label: Node MEN-6 "pseudoline"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6MEN.description: Arachne Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is the basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. The Empress species can hatch a new insect group - Pseudorem .This is a group of insects parasitized by the Arachne pseudoline species from birth, making them disposable infantry that can be produced cheaply and quickly.However, they have poor control and cannot be expected to be disciplined. The blueprints for all technologies of the Arachne insect group must be researched using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4DIL.label: Node DIL-4 "Beginner Textile"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4DIL.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species can hatch new fabrics in textile cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5DIL.label: Node DIL-5 "Intermediate Fabric"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5DIL.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species can hatch new fabrics in textile cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6DIL.label: Node DIL-6 "High quality fabric"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6DIL.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Craft species can hatch new fabrics in textile cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5PAV.label: Node PAV-5 "Poison Needle"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5PAV.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. New weapons can be hatched from Arachne cocoons, and some insect groups with venomous stingers are also capable of ejecting poisonous stingers.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6PAV.label: Node PAV-6 "Tempest"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6PAV.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. New weapons can be hatched from Arachne cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7PAV.label: Node PAV-7 "Blood Needle"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7PAV.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. New weapons can be hatched from Arachne cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8PAV.label: Node PAV-8 "Gigabit Cannon"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8PAV.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the Hive Antenna is the fundamental evolutionary path common to all Insects groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of Insects. It allows the Insects to build strong defensive facilities. It has strong armor penetration and high rate of fire, providing excellent performance against heavily armored targets.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2MEL.label: Node MEL-2 "Rage Whip"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2MEL.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. New weapons can be hatched from Arachne cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3MEL.label: Node MEL-3 "Cystaron"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3MEL.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. New weapons can be hatched from Arachne cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5ESS.label: Node ESS-5 "Essence Extraction"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5ESS.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Enable the Arachne insect swarm to build special biological structures and generate essence by placing prisoners in them. At the same time, construct Arachne genetic experimental eggs and develop special colony technology.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8POD.label: Node POD-8 "Air Sac Type"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8POD.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. . Allows the Insects to build special auxiliary insects. These insects can be used to move items and insects to other locations on the world map without using fuel.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1NPT.label: Node NPT-1 "Central Tower"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1NPT.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The Hive Antenna evolutionary path is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. Enables the insect group to build a central feeding facility, which automatically replenishes structures that require linked nutrients.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5SHL.label: Node SHL-5 "Photoane"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5SHL.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary pathway of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. It allows the insect group to construct specialized fungi that can provide a direct light source to promote plant growth.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6SHL.label: Node SHL-6 "Temperature Control"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6SHL.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. It allows the insect group to construct specialized fixed insects that can control the temperature of a room.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1TUN.label: Node TUN-1 "Mine Type"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1TUN.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is the basic evolutionary path that exists in all insect groups, and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect groups. It allows the insect people to build special fixed insects that can connect two points by digging roads and quickly transport people and supplies.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6GUT.label: Node GUT-6 "Catalyst"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6GUT.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups, and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. It enables insect groups to utilize the catalytic ability of biological giant bacteria to construct various production architectures.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2NPT.label: Node NPT-2 "Dormant Cocoon"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2NPT.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is the fundamental evolutionary path that exists in all insect groups and forms the basis of their biological superiority. It allows the insect people to build cocoons to house their surplus insect people, where they sleep until the will of the colony calls them back.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3NPT.label: Node NPT-3 "Honey Crystal"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3NPT.description: Arachnoid Insect Group - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Allows the Insect tribe to construct burrows that produce Arachne honey cake. Insect nectar is broken down to create edible honey scum. This in-hive processed food helps the Insect tribe survive the effects of cold-blooded animals and has a soft texture that even non-Insect settlers can enjoy.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4NPT.label: Node NPT-4 "Hatchling Pond"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4NPT.description: Arachne insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is the basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups, and it is the biological superiority of the insect group. We are laying the foundation. Enables the Insects to build hatching ponds.It is an incubation facility that specializes in the mass production of Insects.Hatching ponds hatch with higher efficiency than hatching cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8CPE.label: Node CPE-8 "Crop"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8CPE.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary pathway of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. It allows the insect group to grow food crops on the creep.It relies on the creep and soil nutrients to grow and helps provide biomass for the burrow.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9CPE.label: Node CPE-9 "Bee Spike Shooter"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9CPE.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. It allows the insect group to grow specialized crops on the creep. When it grows up, it becomes an aggressive fungus colony that fires poisonous stingers at enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6SPV.label: Node SPV-6 "Insect nest"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6SPV.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. It allows new weapons to be hatched from Arachne cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7SPV.label: Node SPV-7 "Explosive Projection"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7SPV.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the Hive Antenna is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups, and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. It allows the insect group to build powerful defense facilities. It projects explosive seed insects that are mainly suicidal attacks at invading enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2MED.label: Node MED-2 "erosive parasitism"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2MED.description: Arachnoid group - hive antennae The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. It allows the honeycan species to use the parasitic ability of pseudoarachnoid species and releases the production of pseudoarachnoid inhibitors in medical cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5STL.label: Node STL-5 "Gene Stealing"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5STL.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for their biological superiority. Warrior species undergoes directed evolution, losing combat skills and gaining skills for extracting and injecting genes from colonists, prisoners, and slaves. The blueprints for all Arachne Bug technologies must be completed using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1VTE.label: Node VTE-1 "Guardian"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1VTE.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Shield The head species undergoes directional evolution, losing chitin production and building abilities, but gaining combat, movement, and collision attack skills. The blueprints for all Arachne insect technologies must be completed using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1MED.label: Node MED-1 "Healing Seed"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1MED.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for their biological superiority. The honeycan species Perform directed evolution, and in exchange for losing the ability to produce nectar, strengthen your own medical ability and release the medical cocoon hatching skill. The blueprints for all technologies of the Arachne insect group must be researched using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4CLO.label: Node CLO-4 "Tracking Species"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4CLO.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The warrior species undergoes directional evolution, losing the ability to use long-range weapons, but gaining powerful melee combat capabilities and permanent stealth. The blueprints for all Arachne Bug technologies must be completed using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1BAC.label: Node BAC-1 "Bacterial Seed"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1BAC.description: Arachne insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is the basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. Miscellaneous species undergoes directional evolution, and in exchange for losing its defense power and ability to eject information elements, it produces the higher-level resources needed by the insect group, ``active macrobacteria.'' The blueprint for all technologies of the Arachne insect group must be researched using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9WID.label: Node WID-9 "Magnetoviolent"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9WID.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups, and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Aerial species undergo directional evolution, allowing them to fly at high speeds and at high altitudes. In exchange for losing the ability to maneuver, it gains the ability to hurl large numbers of magneto-violent seeds at the enemy. This insect swarm can release EMP in the form of a suicide bomb attack and fight against mechanoids. All technology blueprints of the Arachne insect swarm must be researched using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1FRY.label: Node FRY-1 "Transporter"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1FRY.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antennae The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Aerial species are the leading It undergoes tropic evolution and gains a significant increase in movement speed in caravans at the expense of high-altitude maneuverability and the ability to hatch lichens. The blueprints for all technologies in the Arachnida swarm must be completed using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3CON.label: Node CON-3 "Builder"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3CON.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The shield-headed species undergoes directional evolution, losing defensive abilities and gaining stronger chitin production and building abilities. The blueprints for all technologies of the Arachnidae group must be completed using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8FEL.label: Node FEL-8 "Deflagration Cavity"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8FEL.description: Arachnoid Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. The honeycan species undergoes directional evolution, losing the ability to produce nectar, but gaining enhanced defenses, compound fuel production, and flame-throwing abilities. The blueprints for all technologies of the Arachne insect group must be completed using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3CRP.label: Node CRP-3 "Creep laying"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3CRP.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. The directional mist species It evolves and loses the ability to eject pheromones, but gains increased defense and movement speed, as well as the ability to deploy creep on a large scale. The blueprints for all Arachnida swarm technologies must be completed using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9NAV.label: Node NAV-9 "Regional Navigation Envoy"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9NAV.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Forbidden Through directed evolution of the species, it loses the ability to directly fight and command the ground swarm, but gains the ability to command the aerial insect swarm. The blueprints for all technologies of the Arachne insect swarm must be researched using research methods specific to each antenna branch.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1EVO.label: Node EVO-1 "Beginner Evolution"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1EVO.description: Arachnidium - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. Enables a new Arachnid evolutionary surgery, which strengthens the nutrient storage capacity and carapace of the Arachneid group.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3EVO.label: Node EVO-3 "Gliding Wing Membrane"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3EVO.description: Arachne bugs - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the bug group. Enables a new Arachne evolution surgery: implanting gliding wing membranes on the legs of Arachne bugs, increasing the speed of movement on creep.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4EVO.label: Node EVO-4 "Explosive Decocoon"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4EVO.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. Enables new Arachne evolutionary surgeries. It allows the Arachne Insects to decocoon and use explosive species for suicidal attacks.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5EVO.label: Node EVO-5 "Reactive Shell"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5EVO.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the Hive Antenna is the basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect groups. Enables a new Arachne Evolution Surgery.You can implant a reactive shell that prevents any damage on the Arachne Insects once.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6EVO.label: Node EVO-6 "Reinforced tendon"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6EVO.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups, and lays the foundation for the insect group's biological superiority. Enables a new Arachne evolution surgery, allowing the Arachne Insects to be implanted with tendons that aid in their jumping ability.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8EVO.label: Node EVO-8 "Plastel Shell"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8EVO.description: Arachne Insects - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is the basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect groups. Enables a new Arachne evolution surgery. Plasteel can be implanted into the shells of Arachne insects to give them high defense power.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9EVO.label: Node EVO-9 "Physiological Suppression"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9EVO.description: Arachne Bugs - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the Hive Antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Enables a new Arachne evolutionary surgery.Arachne bugs are freed from lifespan limitations at the cost of losing their self-healing ability.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_10EVO.label: Node EVO-10 "Advanced Lung"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_10EVO.description: Arachnidium - Hive Antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a fundamental evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of the insect group. Enables a new arachne evolutionary surgery, which allows the Arachnoid group to obtain more powerful lungs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2SYM.label: Node SYM-2 "Frost Body"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2SYM.description: Arachne insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of the hive antenna is a basic evolutionary path that exists in common to all insect groups, and it lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Arachne insect group has a special biological architecture - Arachne Allows the construction of biomuscles, which can be fused with the insects to form an unconscious tissue, giving the insects powerful fighting power. The frost condensation symbiotic muscles allow the fused Arachne insects to use a wide variety of rapid-cooling armaments, allowing them to switch between large group control and rapid annihilation of high-value targets.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4COV.label: Node COV-4 "Heavenly Beast Group"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4COV.description: Arachnoid insect group - hive antenna The evolutionary path of hive antennae is a basic evolutionary path common to all insect groups and lays the foundation for the biological superiority of insect groups. Allows the Arachne Bug Tribe to construct a special biological architecture - the Heavenly Shrine Beast Bug.This is a semi-autonomous individual commanded by the Towing Race, which can flexibly attack enemies from the sky and rain death upon command.
